document.full_text: the city of los angeles sued deutsche bank  on wednesday, claiming the global financial institution is one of the biggest "slumlords" in the second-largest u.s. city.
document.title: la sues deutsche bank over foreclosure blight
lines_and_colors: the city of los angeles sued deutsche bank  on wednesday, claiming the global financial institution is one of the biggest "slumlords" in the second-largest u.s. city.
